summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Incho e-commerce website. All core functionalities are working correctly including homepage, search, filtering, WhatsApp ordering, and admin authentication.

design_issues.issue: Test product has placeholder image URL 'Test' instead of actual image

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and incho branding
Category navigation displays and filters products correctly
Fuzzy search works across product names and descriptions
Advanced filters: price range, stock status, sorting all functional
Product cards display with correct information
Product detail modal opens and displays full information
WhatsApp order button generates correct link with Lebanese phone number +961 71 294 697
Admin login redirects to Emergent OAuth correctly
Admin panel is properly protected (requires authentication)
All API endpoints return correct status codes
Mobile responsiveness - all key elements visible and functional
Session management and logout functionality implemented
Backend API fuzzy search across multiple fields working
Backend filtering by price range, stock status, and sorting working
action_item_for_main_agent: Add more sample products and categories with proper images and realistic data to showcase the full e-commerce functionality. Current test data is minimal.
